name: s3.yaml
content:
g8client__cl:
  url: 'uk-g8-1.demo.greenitglobe.com'
  login: 'yves'
  password: 'IAM4greenIT'
  account: 'Account of Yves'

vdc__vdc4s3:
  g8client: 'cl'
  account: 'Account of Yves'
  location: 'uk-g8-1'

disk.ovc__disk1:
  size: 1000

s3__s3server:
  vdc: 'vdc4s3'
  disk:
    - 'disk1'
  domain: 'mystorage.com'
  key.access: 'access'
  key.secret: 'secret'

actions:
  - action: 'install'
